description:
Alternative wrapper to the Virtual Paradise C SDK. Allows for the creation of bots to interact with 3D virtual worlds.

Features a more C#-centric design, including structs and utility classes useful for VP/VR concepts.

The native libraries are packaged into the assembly and are automatically unpacked on use. Supported architectures:

* x64 Linux (CentOS-based)
* x86 Windows
* x64 Windows
releaseNotes:
0.3.2-pre - Made assembly AnyCPU and contains both x86 and x64 Windows natives now

0.3.1-pre - Added utility method for splitting unicode messages by byte VP limit (255), made all say and console methods automatically split long messages

0.3.0-pre - Infinite call loop fixes for ConsoleMessage, removed some ConsoleMessage methods for simplicity

0.2.3-pre - Fixed null object data bug and potential memory leaks

0.2.2-pre - Added NodeSet callback to terrain

0.2.1-pre - Updated to VP SDK 0.3.37 / r1093 featuring:
* Ability to send URLs to clients to open in a 3D overlay or external browser
* Single-object query by ID and callback
* Disconnection event reasons

0.2.0-pre - Mostly rewritten to formalize an API, complete implementation of all bot-accessible features

0.1.0-pre - Forked and adapted from official .NET wrapper
summary: Alternative library for writing Virtual Paradise bots
title: libVirtualParadise.NET
